# pytest: simple powerful testing with Python
# https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pytest/3.2.1
pytest==3.2.1


# Pytest plugin for measuring coverage.
# https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pytest-cov/2.5.1
pytest-cov==2.5.1


# Rolling backport of unittest.mock for all Pythons
# https://pypi.python.org/pypi/mock/2.0.0
mock==2.0.0


# A Django plugin for pytest.
# https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pytest-django/3.1.2
pytest-django==3.1.2


# the modular source code checker: pep8, pyflakes and co
# https://pypi.python.org/pypi/flake8/2.5.4
flake8==2.5.4
